channel.title: 24/7 NewRune | Castle Wars | Highscores | Pking | Tasks | All Skills | Pking
channel.description:
[center][url=http://newrune.net][img]http://i53.tinypic.com/30391lu.gif[/img][/url][/center]
[center][size=15pt][b]New Rune[/b][/size] The story about this server is short and easy. RuneScape Private servers needed something cool and awesome not some boring server where you get bored after 99 Skills or maxed account. We have lots of features so you wont never get bored, as every feature is perfected aswell ;). You wont regret joining this awesome epic server! So what you waiting if you still dont believe me look down. [/center]
[size=15pt]Promotional Video:[/size] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t_NMdAYM8SI&feature=channel_video_title[/youtube]
[size=15pt]Important Links:[/size] [url=http://pastehtml.com/view/bs7ppd5ih.html]~~ Webclient ~~[/url] [url=http://co11.uppit.com/dl/n5olzd4lygui563mvuhz7ypkxghpahpl2wkueczcf2hfqzhuhguzi3e5/NewRune%20V5.0%20Official%20Client.zip]~~ Downloadable Client ~~[/url]
[size=15pt]Why would you join this server?[/size]
[ul][li]We have all new RS items! (pernix, torva, virtus, primal, ...)[/li] [li]No lagg ! (We are running on a dedicated server!)[/li] [li]Awesome staff team[/li] [li]Awesome Forums[/li] [li]Every feature what people loves on a RSPS[/li] [li]This beats runescape.[/li][/ul]
[size=15pt]Server Features:[/size]
[ul][li]24/7[/li] [li]No lagg[/li] [li]Perfect Pking[/li] [li]Perfect Skilling[/li] [li]Clipped Following[/li] [li]Castle Wars[/li] [li]Fight Pits[/li] [li]Dicing[/li] [li]7+ Minigames[/li] [li]10+ Bosses[/li] [li]10+ Area’s to train[/li] [li]Skilling Area[/li] [li]Custom TASKS SYSTEM[/li] [li]Slayer Points with a Slayer shop[/li] [li]Custom Lottery System[/li] [li]Custom Beginner area and tutorial[/li] [li]Amazing Home[/li] [li]Curse Prayer (All working)[/li] [li]Following clipped[/li] [li]Npc following clipped[/li] [li]Ancient magic[/li] [li]Lunar Magic[/li] [li]Alot teleports[/li] [li]Friendly staff[/li] [li]Friendly community[/li] [li]Perfect prices for items[/li] [li]Godwars[/li] [li]KBD[/li] [li]Tormented Demons[/li] [li]Dragon Claws[/li] [li]All Chaotic items[/li] [li]PK point System[/li] [li]Vote for cash/Pk points System[/li] [li]Cool Donator island[/li] [li]Donator rank in game with crown[/li] [li]Perfect 603 Anims/Gfx[/li] [li]ALL NEW RS ITEMS![/li][/ul]
[size=15pt]Server Pictures:[/size]
[img]http://img862.imageshack.us/img862/8282/castlewars.png[/img] [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/512/fightpitsx.png[/img] [img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/939/dicing.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/23wwmfr.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/1z3m1w4.png[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/dn0y2r.png[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/1058j9v.png[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2d99xrc.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2qhzwq9.png[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/24o64a1.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/x5pbuu.png[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/abl8vd.png[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2462s15.png[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/xdwema.png[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/muvol5.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/15yzzes.png[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/qy7okw.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2v9xitf.png[/img]
[b][size=15pt]Come check us out today! [/size][/b] [url=http://newrune.net]NewRune's Forum[/url]
